item.description:
Members of our group, Pam Williams and her husband Bob, are on the Marblehead dog park committee. They are having a Doggie Fun Day to raise some funds to pay for a chain link fence, etc. for the park.

Let's show our support and join them for a fun filled afternoon. Of course, feel free to bring your 4-legged friends. Event will be held rain or shine and will go until 7:00pm.

Fun Day activities include:

  • Dog Parade
  • Dog Contests (best costume, etc.)
  • Live&Silent Auction
  • Sing-a-long for kids
  • Food
  • Dog Freebies
  • Dog Vendors
  • Face Painting for kids
  • and lots more!!


In addition, Mary Orne who is the Northeast Regional Director of Lucky Star Cav Rescue will be attending.


You can find more info about the dog park here: http://www.marblehead...

They are still trying to find someone who could do the silent auction table (not collect anything, just run it). If you or someone you know can donate some time, please let Pam know!
item.how_to_find_us: From Google.com, it looks like the door is on the left side of the building where the signs are. Let's meet there!

group.name: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel Lovers of MA

item.name: Marblehead Doggie Fun Day
